ygData.msgSnippet: ... Land Mine, I think she s over... she sees Land Mine cutting on herself.  She runs over and grabs the blade out of Land Mine s hands. Are you crazy?

::KitKat::

"Land Mine, I think she's over..." she sees Land Mine cutting on 
herself.  She runs over and grabs the blade out of Land Mine's hands.
"Are you crazy? Don't go cutting on yourself like that. Geeez. What 
is going through your mental circuits?" She wiped the blade off held 
it out of Land Mine's reach.
She looked at Land Mine. She sighed and spoke with a soft, concerned 
voice. "Look, if you have someting you want to talk about, why don't 
we go for a walk and we can talk alone OK? I don't want a member of 
my team hurting themselves like this.  Fighting Maximals will get you 
hurt soon enough." She motioned for them to go outside. "Please come 
with me and we can talk about it."


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "THECODE" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> Land Mine frowns.
> 
> "Yeah, thanks." Land Mine says. Land Mine already sees herself as 
useless
> and ponders for ways of killing herself. Time Bomb is bored as Pit 
and
> ponders ways to kill himself. Deemos ponders ways to kill himself, 
and so
> does Inzola. Isn't this nice? Every one of my characters want to 
kill
> themselves. (Nothing personal everyone, it was a joke.) Now for the 
real
> post.
> 
> Land Mine frowns.
> 
> "Thank you, KitKat." She whispers. She already feels not needed. 
She walks
> away slowly and sits in a corner. She pulls out a knife and starts 
to abuse
> herself with it, slowly cutting her wrists and letting the mech 
fluid flow
> freely. Hopefully, the mech fluid would run out quick, because she 
was in
> lots of pain. Time Bomb walks around to the bunch inside of the 
Predacon
> cave.
> 
> "Hey, where's Land Mine?" He asks...
